item.title: META
item.description: score:1 Chances: Meta Platforms, Inc. is a leading developer of social media applications, with a strong focus on technology that connects people, builds communities, and supports businesses. The company operates through two segments, the Family of Apps and Reality Labs, indicating a diverse portfolio of offerings.

item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:-172 Chances: Snap Inc. continues to attract attention as it closes at $11.16 in the latest trading session, marking a slight -0.36% move from the previous day. The company’s co-founder and CEO’s statement on potential profits following the tech company’s public launch indicates an optimistic outlook for its future performance.
